blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: dnpdoggos
blog.title: 🐶 shitposts mainly 💗
blog.description:
✧ 𝙼𝚊𝚍𝚎𝚕𝚒𝚗𝚎 · 𝟸𝟷 · 𝚍𝚎𝚙𝚛𝚎𝚜𝚜𝚎𝚍 · 𝚕𝚘𝚟𝚎𝚜 𝚍𝚘𝚐𝚜
 ✧

summary: gender roles are the worst kind of bread; so shut the fuck up.
body:
gender roles are the worst kind of bread; so shut the fuck up.

Apparently, there is or was some drama by the disgusting twitter phannies where some people were calling Dan “feminine” and then other people were replying that saying that “takes away Dan’s masculinity” and acting as if femininity is bad or something.

Now there is quite a lot to unpack here. But I am a lazy blobfish so that’s not going to happen. 

  • In short, I don’t doubt that some of this discourse stems from the (possibly internal and unknown) misogyny or sexism and transphobia some people have. 

And so now, people seem to be talking about that and saying that “Dan is literally very feminine and that fine”. But like…no?

On more than Dan has spoken against gender roles. [1]

And I don’t think he’d appreciate people enforcing the very thing he’s spoken against (gender roles) onto him, by labeling him as “masculine or feminine”.

So shut up. They are constructs and help make up gender roles and fuck those.
